original_text: King Herod saw that the Jews were happy because he had killed James. So he sent his soldiers to take hold of Peter too. This happened during the Festival of Flat Bread.
korean_text: 유대인들이 이 일을 기뻐하는 것을 보고 베드로도 잡으려 할새 때는 무교절 기간이라

sentences.original_text: King Herod saw that the Jews were happy
sentences.korean_translation: 헤롯 왕은 유대인들이 기뻐하는 것을 보았다

sentences.original_text: to take hold of Peter too
This happened during the Festival of Flat Bread
